properties.name: uri
properties.description: The URI for the image on the device to get scaled

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the new image

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the new image

properties.name: folderName
properties.description: The name of the folder the image should be put(Android only)

properties.name: quality
properties.description: Quality given as Number for the quality of the new image(Android and iOS only)

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: A custom name for the file. Default name is a timestamp(Android and Windows only)
